verses.esv: 33 I have said these things to you, that in me you may have peace. In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.”
verses.kjv: 33 These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
verses.niv: 33 "I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world."

verses.esv:
10   fear not, for I am with you;
    be not dismayed, for I am your God;
  I will strengthen you, I will help you,
    I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
verses.kjv: 10 Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
verses.niv: 10 So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

verses.esv: 9 And let us not grow weary of doing good, for in due season we will reap, if we do not give up.
verses.kjv: 9 And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
verses.niv: 9 Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.

verses.esv:
18   The LORD is near to the brokenhearted
    and saves the crushed in spirit.
verses.kjv: 18 The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
verses.niv: 18 The LORD is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.

verses.esv: 7 casting all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you.
verses.kjv: 7 Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
verses.niv: 7 Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

verses.esv: 7 And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 7 And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

verses.esv: 28 Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. 29 Take my yoke upon you, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.
verses.kjv: 28 Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. 29 Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.
verses.niv: 28 "Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest. 29 Take my yoke upon you and learn from me, for I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.

verses.esv: 28 And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good, for those who are called according to his purpose.
verses.kjv: 28 And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
verses.niv: 28 And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

verses.esv:
4   Be angry, and do not sin;
    ponder in your own hearts on your beds, and be silent. Selah
5   Offer right sacrifices,
    and put your trust in the LORD.
verses.kjv: 4 Stand in awe, and sin not: commune with your own heart upon your bed, and be still. Selah. 5 Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, and put your trust in the LORD.
verses.niv: 4 In your anger do not sin; when you are on your beds, search your hearts and be silent. Selah 5 Offer right sacrifices and trust in the LORD.

verses.esv:
6   In all your ways acknowledge him,
    and he will make straight your paths.
verses.kjv: 6 In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
verses.niv: 6 in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

verses.esv: 14 The LORD will fight for you, and you have only to be silent.”
verses.kjv: 14 The LORD shall fight for you, and ye shall hold your peace.
verses.niv: 14 The LORD will fight for you; you need only to be still."

verses.esv:
5   Trust in the LORD with all your heart,
    and do not lean on your own understanding.
6   In all your ways acknowledge him,
    and he will make straight your paths.
verses.kjv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. 6 In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
verses.niv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; 6 in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

verses.esv: 19 Know this, my beloved brothers: let every person be quick to hear, slow to speak, slow to anger;
verses.kjv: 19 Wherefore, my beloved brethren, let every man be swift to hear, slow to speak, slow to wrath:
verses.niv: 19 My dear brothers, take note of this: Everyone should be quick to listen, slow to speak and slow to become angry,

verses.esv:
3   You keep him in perfect peace
    whose mind is stayed on you,
    because he trusts in you.
verses.kjv: 3 Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
verses.niv: 3 You will keep in perfect peace him whose mind is steadfast, because he trusts in you.

verses.esv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope. 12 Then you will call upon me and come and pray to me, and I will hear you. 13 You will seek me and find me, when you seek me with all your heart.
verses.kjv: 11 For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end. 12 Then shall ye call upon me, and ye shall go and pray unto me, and I will hearken unto you. 13 And ye shall seek me, and find me, when ye shall search for me with all your heart.
verses.niv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you," declares the LORD, "plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future. 12 Then you will call upon me and come and pray to me, and I will listen to you. 13 You will seek me and find me when you seek me with all your heart.

verses.esv: 4 He will wipe away every tear from their eyes, and death shall be no more, neither shall there be mourning, nor crying, nor pain anymore, for the former things have passed away.”
verses.kjv: 4 And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.
verses.niv: 4 He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain, for the old order of things has passed away."

verses.esv:
11   Good sense makes one slow to anger,
    and it is his glory to overlook an offense.
verses.kjv: 11 The discretion of a man deferreth his anger; and it is his glory to pass over a transgression.
verses.niv: 11 A man's wisdom gives him patience; it is to his glory to overlook an offense.

verses.esv: 9 Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be frightened, and do not be dismayed, for the LORD your God is with you wherever you go.”
verses.kjv: 9 Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the LORD thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
verses.niv: 9 Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be terrified; do not be discouraged, for the LORD your God will be with you wherever you go."

verses.esv:
29   Whoever is slow to anger has great understanding,
    but he who has a hasty temper exalts folly.
verses.kjv: 29 He that is slow to wrath is of great understanding: but he that is hasty of spirit exalteth folly.
verses.niv: 29 A patient man has great understanding, but a quick-tempered man displays folly.

verses.esv:
9   Be not quick in your spirit to become angry,
    for anger lodges in the heart of fools.
verses.kjv: 9 Be not hasty in thy spirit to be angry: for anger resteth in the bosom of fools.
verses.niv: 9 Do not be quickly provoked in your spirit, for anger resides in the lap of fools.

verses.esv: 8 But now you must put them all away: anger, wrath, malice, slander, and obscene talk from your mouth.
verses.kjv: 8 But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.
verses.niv: 8 But now you must rid yourselves of all such things as these: anger, rage, malice, slander, and filthy language from your lips.

verses.esv: 6 do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God. 7 And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 6 Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 6 Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God. 7 And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

verses.esv:
5   For God alone, O my soul, wait in silence,
    for my hope is from him.
6   He only is my rock and my salvation,
    my fortress; I shall not be shaken.
7   On God rests my salvation and my glory;
    my mighty rock, my refuge is God.
8   Trust in him at all times, O people;
    pour out your heart before him;
    God is a refuge for us. Selah
verses.kjv: 5 My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him. 6 He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved. 7 In God is my salvation and my glory: the rock of my strength, and my refuge, is in God. 8 Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.
verses.niv: 5 Find rest, O my soul, in God alone; my hope comes from him. 6 He alone is my rock and my salvation; he is my fortress, I will not be shaken. 7 My salvation and my honor depend on God; he is my mighty rock, my refuge. 8 Trust in him at all times, O people; pour out your hearts to him, for God is our refuge. Selah

verses.esv: 19 Know this, my beloved brothers: let every person be quick to hear, slow to speak, slow to anger; 20 for the anger of man does not produce the righteousness of God.
verses.kjv: 19 Wherefore, my beloved brethren, let every man be swift to hear, slow to speak, slow to wrath: 20 For the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God.
verses.niv: 19 My dear brothers, take note of this: Everyone should be quick to listen, slow to speak and slow to become angry, 20 for man's anger does not bring about the righteous life that God desires.

verses.esv:
11   God is a righteous judge,
    and a God who feels indignation every day.
verses.kjv: 11 God judgeth the righteous, and God is angry with the wicked every day.
verses.niv: 11 God is a righteous judge, a God who expresses his wrath every day.
